mapper.select: select t1.city as city, t1.cnt as cnt from (select city, count(1) as cnt from job_message group by city) as t1 order by t1.cnt desc
select count(1) as cnt, city, second_type from lagou_job_message group by city, second_type order by city, cnt desc

select finance_stage, district, count(1) as cnt from lagou_job_message where city = #{city} and substring(job_create_ime, 1, 10) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' group by finance_stage,city,district

select count(1) as cnt, city, district from lagou_job_message where substring(job_create_ime, 1, 10) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and city in('北京','上海','广州','深圳','杭州') group by city, district
select count(1) as cnt, city, substring(job_create_ime, 1, 10) as ds from lagou_job_message where substring(job_create_ime, 1, 10) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' group by city, ds;
select count(1) as cnt, city from lagou_job_message where substring(job_create_ime, 1, 10) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' group by city;

select
company_name,compnay_short_name,
second_type,
count(1) as cnt from lagou_job_message
group by company_name
group by second_type
order by cnt desc limit 20

select
work_year,
education,
subway_line,
station_name,
business_zones,
finance_stage,
salary,
count(1) as cnt from lagou_job_message where substring(job_create_ime, 1, 10) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and city = #{city}
group by work_year
group by education
and subway_line != 'None' group by subway_line
and station_name != 'None' group by station_name
group by business_zones
group by finance_stage
group by salary
order by cnt desc
limit 20
limit 20

select distinct longitude,company_name, compnay_short_name, latitude from lagou_job_message where city= #{city} and longitude != 'None' and latitude != 'None' and substring(job_create_ime, 1, 10) = '${date}'
and (company_name like '%${company_name}%' or compnay_short_name like '%${company_name}%')

select
distinct city as city
distinct company_size as company_size
distinct finance_stage as finance_stage
distinct first_type as first_type
distinct second_type as second_type
distinct third_type as third_type
distinct work_year as work_year
distinct education as education
1 = 1
from lagou_job_message

select
work_year
education
from lagou_job_message
where ${cons}
